page.title: 20ROMSEY ADVERTISER
page.content:
Since 1896 yearly files have been kept. The Advertiser is a weekly paper but it works like a daily paper. The news a journalist looks for is people, names, faces, births, marriages and deaths. Twenty-six years ago the paper only had 4 pages, no photos and cost 1p. Today the paper has 12 pages and costs 14p. The Romsey Advertiser is also sold in America, Canada, Belgium and South Africa.
Material produced in tutor group, History, Geography and English lessons by 2P at Romsey School (11-16). Further material from: Romsey Infant School Romsey Junior School
